title: Find Your Most Profitable Category or Niche with the New Publisher Rocket Update!

tactics.name: category_insights_analysis
tactics.description: Evaluate categories using Publisher Rocket's new insights tab to identify profitable niches with low competition and high growth potential.
steps: Check average indie price and publisher distribution
Analyze historical sales trends and category growth
Compare competition levels between large vs indie publishers
caveats: Data may lag behind real-time market changes

tactics.name: Historical Sales Analysis
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to analyze monthly sales trends and category performance over time
steps: Search for categories like children's picture books
Compare monthly sales data (e.g., 199 vs 194 sales)
Identify uptrends or declines in sales patterns
caveats: Data may be speculative during holiday periods
source_quotes: look at this it looks like it might be coming back up

tactics.name: review threshold filtering
tactics.description: identify niches with low review counts and high BSR for profitability
caveats: when it fails to account for seasonal trends
source_quotes: be you're not ready for it yet then check out this video

heuristics.name: competition_filter
heuristics.condition: If a category has >85% large publisher dominance, it's highly competitive

heuristics.name: Sales Trend Boost
heuristics.condition: If sales show a recent uptick despite overall decline, prioritize the niche
source_quotes: this might be the time to jump into this Niche

heuristics.name: review density heuristic
heuristics.condition: If median_reviews is less than 200 then boost
source_quotes: YouTube says is right up your alley

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket now shows average indie book prices in categories
Categories with lower book age show better month-over-month sales
source_quotes: average amount of days since publication

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket provides historical sales data for KDP categories
source_quotes: we now do in Publisher rocket

niche_patterns.description: Niche combining educational content with accessible formats for target audiences
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Balances high demand with lower competition from large publishers
source_quotes: 'Early learning children's ebooks... 49% are large Publishers'

niche_patterns.example: children's picture books + basic concepts + holiday season
niche_patterns.description: Identify niches with specific educational themes and seasonal trends
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines targeted content with temporary demand spikes
source_quotes: children's picture books for you know basic concepts
